issues.description: The `acceptSupplyDelivery` method in the solution is declared with package‚Äêprivate visibility (`static void`) but the specification and UML indicate it should be public (`+acceptSupplyDelivery(String, int, int): void`). This mismatch can prevent external callers or tests from accessing the method as intended.
issues.suggested_fix:
Declare the method as public static: 

    public static void acceptSupplyDelivery(String name, int price, int quantity) { ... }
